channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Thames Path blocked, 9th September
item.description:
Thames path has been blocked by locked gates between Imperial Court and New Caledonian Wharf and so preventing access. In addition Odessa Street is not navigable on footpaths for a wheelchair and so it is unsafe for wheelchair users to travel along this part of the Thames Path.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 6, Odessa Street, Rotherhithe, London
Report on FixMyStreet

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Hugh Street, Victoria, London

item.title: Flytipped bin bag, 9th September
item.description:
Flytipped bin bag containing lots of beer bottles dumped by tree on the junction of Hawes Road and Plaistow Lane. Can you please clear? Thanks.

item.title: Old abandoned caravan, 9th September
item.description:
A caravan without wheels has been left on the pavement and causing obstruction for pedestrians. Please cleared this as a nuisance to the enjoyment of the area.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Middle Park Avenue, Middle Park, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Leaking black liquid on footway, 9th September
item.description:
Leaking black paint on footway causing a slip hazard. I have already witnessed someone slip, fall and hurt themselves consequent to walking on the black liquid/paint. Please can someone urgently attend and clean off the footway as it is at a junction (Heber Road and Landcroft Road) and is very dangerous should someone slip and fall into the road. There is also two schools within close proximity to this hazard, so there are a lot of children walking through this route.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 263, Lordship Lane, East Dulwich, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Plastic road barriers, 9th September
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Cedars Road, Beckenham, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Waste not collected for 4 houses, 9th September
item.description:
We have not had our waste cans and tins collected from number 1-4 Millfield cottages even thiuhh go they was displayed quite clearly the night before so yet again they have lied and said it wasn’t out in the morning!! I am disabled as I’ve frequently told you and it is hazardous for me to walk!
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 3, Millfields Cottages, Poverest, London
Report on FixMyStreet
